data.eml:eml: Parioglossus galzini, a new species of ptereleotrid dartfish from Rapa Island (Teleostei: Gobioidei: Ptereleotridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Williams, Jeffrey T., Lecchini, David (2004): Parioglossus galzini, a new species of ptereleotrid dartfish from Rapa Island (Teleostei: Gobioidei: Ptereleotridae). Zootaxa 506: 1-8, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157750
